Ξ.SCHEMA.effect: Encapsulates object into universal schema format.

Ξ.REFLECT.effect: Produces meta-level representation of object and its lineage.

Ξ.BIND.effect: Ensures compatibility and binds distinct semantic structures.

Ξ.UNIFY.effect: Maps all tier-NFs into a single Ξ-normal form.

Ξ.SELF.effect: Produces description of entire IGSOA system including Ξ itself.
